snippet: Tenisha Fearon, who is accused of throwing her 6-month-old from a sixth-floor window, ran a licensed center in her home until April, relatives and officials said.
abstract: Tenisha Fearon, Bronx woman charged with killing 6-month-old Junilah Lawrence by throwing her from apartment window, was for two years licensed day care provider; Fearon is third woman in New York to throw baby to its death in several months.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and EMILY PALMER

lead_paragraph: Tenisha Fearon, who is accused of throwing her 6-month-old from a sixth-floor window, ran a licensed center in her home until April, relatives and officials said.

headline.main: Bronx Woman Charged in Her Baby’s Killing Was Once a Day Care Provider
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged With Killing Her Baby Was Once a Day Care Provider
